mechanics¶

Attributes¶

r

Classes¶

DiscStress

Computes disc stress

BladeStress

Computes blade stress according to Osborne et al.

Materials

Module Contents¶

class mechanics.DiscStress¶

Computes disc stress

_ksigma¶

experimental coefficient increasing the stress

usually between 0.75 and 1. > 1 to be conservative.

Default is 1.2

Type:

float

_ksigma = 1.2¶
compute_stress(density, impeller_speed, poisson_ratio)¶

Computes the disc stress

Osbourne disc stress

Parameters:

  • density (float) – Impeller’s materials’ density

  • impeller_speed (float) – Impeller’s peripheral tangential velocity U2

  • poisson_ratio (float) – Impeller’s materials’ poisson ratio

Returns:

Maximal disc stress according to Osborn

Return type:

float

class mechanics.BladeStress¶

Computes blade stress according to Osborne et al.

compute_f(x, taper_ratio, type_taper='parabolic')¶

Compute the normalized stress factor

  1. Osborne, P. Runstadler Jr, and W. D. Stacy, “Aerodynamic and mechanical design of an 8: 1 pressure ratio centrifugal compressor,” Creare Incorporated, 1974.

xfloat

Normalized distance along the blade from tip to root (0 to 1).

taper_ratiofloat

Blade thickness at hub divided by blade thickness at tip t_hub/t_tip.

type_taperstring

Taper interpolation type.

linear or parabolic

Returns:

Normalized stress factor

Return type:

float

Raises:

NotImplementedError – if type is not linear or parabolic, raises the implementation error

compute_stress(blade_height, density, outlet_diameter, rot_speed, outlet_blade_angle, ttip, taper_ratio, type_taper='parabolic')¶

Compute the stress

  1. Osborne, P. Runstadler Jr, and W. D. Stacy, “Aerodynamic and mechanical design of an 8: 1 pressure ratio centrifugal compressor,” Creare Incorporated, 1974.

blade_heightfloat

Impeller’s outlet blade height.

densityfloat

Impeller’s materials’ density.

outlet_diameterfloat

Impeller’s outlet_diameter.

rot_speedfloat

Impeller’s rotation speed in rad/s.

outlet_blade_anglefloat

Impeller’s blades’ outlet angle in radians.

ttipfloat

Impeller’s blades’ thickness at the tip (opposed to the hub)

taper_ratiofloat

Blade thickness at hub divided by blade thickness at tip t_hub/t_tip.

type_taperstring

Taper interpolation type.

linear or parabolic

Returns:

Stress at the root of the blades

Return type:

float

class mechanics.Materials(name='316L', Youngmodulus=200000000.0, poisson=0.33, yieldstress=179000000.0, density=7916)¶
_name¶
_youngmodulus¶
_poisson¶
_yieldstress¶
_density¶
get_MOS(stress=1)¶

If we are at the yieldstress = 0 If we are lower than the yieldstress > 0 If we are bigger than the yieldstress < 0

mechanics.r = 0.07976¶
